reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The project promotes child friendly budgeting in Siaya, Kakamega, Kwale, Wajir and Mombasa counties. In Kenya, nearly 50 % of the population is children. Many of them suffer from poor nutrition, inadequate health services and insufficient basic education. In order to improve the quality and access to services, increased governmental funding is needed. The project ensures that children benefit from greater public and private investment and better use of society?s resources in realizing their rights. The fund s towards children within target counties increases and the allocation of funds becomes more transparent and accountable. The beneficiaries of this project are the most vulnerable children and their families. The project is implemented by Kenya Alliance fo r Advancement of Children (KAACR).
